title: Mobile-Based Collaborative Language Practice Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational use of digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Design adapting language arts curriculum, which requires practice-oriented field education, to a virtual environment

learning_goals: Students improve language practice skills through collaborative task performance in mobile environments.
Learners can revise and improve language assignments by over 85% using peer feedback.
Learners achieve voluntary learning participation at least three times weekly using digital collaboration tools (chat, shared documents, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
